text: The Aetolia-Acarnania Folklore Museum is a museum in Agrinio, Greece. The museum was founded in 1977 by the pan-Aetolia-Acarnania women's association. ==References== ==External links== *Municipality of Agrinio Museum info and photos Category:Folklore museums in Greece Category:Museums established in 1977 Category:Museums in Western Greece Category:Agrinio
title: Aetolia-Acarnania Folklore Museum
